snippet: A report by the American Association for Long-Term Care Insurance finds that rates rose this year an average of 9 percent.
abstract: Ann Carrns Your Money Adviser column offers questions and answers about long-term care insurance, in light of American Assn for Long-Term Care Insurance report that found rates rose in 2014 by nearly 9 percent.
lead_paragraph: A report by the American Association for Long-Term Care Insurance finds that rates rose this year an average of 9 percent.

headline.print_headline: Long-Term Care Insurance: Costs Are Up but Vary Widely
headline.main: Long-Term Care Insurance: Costs Are Up but Vary Widely

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: American Association for Long-Term Care Insurance
